hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Umar said:"The messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) used to pray atop his mount while travelling, facing whatever direction it was facing." (One of the narrators) Malik said: "Abdullah bin Dinar said: and Ibn Umar used to do likewise

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَالِ الَّتِي يَجُوزُ عَلَيْهَا اسْتِقْبَالُ غَيْرِ الْقِبْلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Situation in which it is permissible to face a direction other than the Qibla
